title: Reverse Image Hunt
description:
You receive an image of a landmark building during an investigation. What Google service allows you to upload an image and find visually similar images and web pages where it appears?

Submit the name of the service as: flag{service_name} (lowercase, underscores for spaces)
hints: Google offers a visual search tool
You can access it by clicking the camera icon in Google search
Previously known as 'Google Reverse Image Search', now integrated into a newer tool
